Package infodynamics.measures.continuous

Class ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorMultiVariateViaMutualInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • infodynamics.measures.continuous.ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorViaMutualInfo
      • infodynamics.measures.continuous.ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorMultiVariateViaMutualInfo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ActiveInfoStorageCalculator, ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorMultiVariate, InfoMeasureCalculatorContinuous, EmpiricalNullDistributionComputer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorMultiVariateGaussian, ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorMultiVariateKernel, ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorMultiVariateKraskov
    public class ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorMultiVariateViaMutualInfo
extends ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorViaMutualInfo
implements ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorMultiVariate
    An Active Information Storage (AIS) calculator (implementing ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorMultiVariate) which is affected using a given Mutual Information (MI) calculator (implementing MutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariate) to make the calculations.

    Usage is as per the paradigm outlined for ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorMultiVariate, except that in the constructor(s) for this class the implementation for a MutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariate must be supplied.

    This class may be used directly, however users are advised that several child classes are available which already plug-in the various MI estimators to provide AIS calculators (taking specific caution associated with each type of estimator):

    • ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorMultiVariateGaussian
    • ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorMultiVariateKernel
    • ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorMultiVariateKraskov

    References:

    • J.T. Lizier, M. Prokopenko and A.Y. Zomaya, "Local measures of information storage in complex distributed computation", Information Sciences, vol. 208, pp. 39-54, 2012.
    Author:
    Pedro AM Mediano (email, www), Joseph Lizier (email, www) and Pedro AM Mediano
    See Also:
    ActiveInfoStorageCalculator, ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorViaMutualInfo, ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorMultiVariate

                       int tau)

      • setProperty

        public void setProperty​(java.lang.String propertyName,
                        java.lang.String propertyValue)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Sets properties for the AIS Multivariate calculator. New property values are not guaranteed to take effect until the next call to an initialise method.

        Valid property names, and what their values should represent, include:

        • ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorMultiVariate.PROP_DIMENSIONS -- how many multivariate dimensions the data will have.
        • Any properties accepted by ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorViaMutualInfo.setProperty(String, String)
        • Or properties accepted by the underlying InfoMeasureCalculatorContinuous.setProperty(String, String) implementation.

        Note: further properties may be defined by child classes.

        Unknown property values are ignored.

        Specified by:
        setProperty in interface ActiveInfoStorageCalculator
        Specified by:
        setProperty in interface InfoMeasureCalculatorContinuous
        Overrides:
        setProperty in class ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorViaMutualInfo
        Parameters:
        propertyName - name of the property
        propertyValue - value of the property.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if there is a problem with the supplied value).

      • addObservations

        public void addObservations​(double[] observations,
                            boolean[] valid)
                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Description copied from interface: ActiveInfoStorageCalculator
        Add more time-series for the computation of the PDF, subject to the validity of each sample in that series. The array observations must not be over-written by the user until after finaliseAddObservations() has been called.
        Specified by:
        addObservations in interface ActiveInfoStorageCalculator
        Specified by:
        addObservations in interface ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorMultiVariate
        Overrides:
        addObservations in class ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorViaMutualInfo
        Parameters:
        observations - time-series array of (univariate) samples, where the array index is time.
        valid - a time series (with indices the same as observations) indicating whether the entry in observations at that index is valid; we only take vectors as samples to add to the observation set where all points in the time series (even between points in the embedded k-vector with embedding delays) are valid.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if initialised dimensions were not 1

        protected void addObservationsWithGivenParams​(MutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariate miCalc_in_use,
                                              int k_in_use,
                                              int tau_in_use,
                                              double[][] observations,
                                              boolean[] valid)
                                       throws java.lang.Exception
        Protected method to internally parse and submit observations through to the supplied MI calculator with the given embedding parameters. This is done given a time-series of booleans indicating whether each entry is valid
        Parameters:
        miCalc_in_use - MI calculator to supply
        k_in_use - k embedding dimension to use
        tau_in_use - tau embedding delay to use
        observations - time series of observations
        valid - a time series (with indices the same as observations) indicating whether the entry in observations at that index is valid; we only take vectors as samples to add to the observation set where all points in the time series (even between points in the embedded k-vector with embedding delays) are valid.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • computeLocalUsingPreviousObservations

        public double[] computeLocalUsingPreviousObservations​(double[] newObservations)
                                               throws java.lang.Exception

        Computes the local values of the active information storage for each valid observation in the supplied univariate observations Can only be called on this multivariate calculator if the dimensions of both source and destination are 1, otherwise throws an exception

        Compute the local AIS values for each of the supplied samples in newObservations.

        PDFs are computed using all of the previously supplied observations, but not those in newObservations (unless they were some of the previously supplied samples).

        Specified by:
        computeLocalUsingPreviousObservations in interface ActiveInfoStorageCalculator
        Specified by:
        computeLocalUsingPreviousObservations in interface ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorMultiVariate
        Overrides:
        computeLocalUsingPreviousObservations in class ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorViaMutualInfo
        Parameters:
        newObservations - univariate observations
        Returns:
        time-series of local AIS values corresponding to newObservations (the first (k-1)*tau + 1 values are set to 0 since AIS is undefined there)
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if initialised dimensions were not 1

      • computeLocalUsingPreviousObservations

        public double[] computeLocalUsingPreviousObservations​(double[][] newObservations)
                                               throws java.lang.Exception
        Description copied from interface: ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorMultiVariate
        As per ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorMultiVariate.computeLocalUsingPreviousObservations(double[]) only with multivariate observations
        Specified by:
        computeLocalUsingPreviousObservations in interface ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorMultiVariate
        Parameters:
        newObservations - time-series array of (multivariate) samples, where the first index is time.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
